translations: n.棚屋；[建]棚式建筑物（shed 的复数）
v.把……放在棚内；在棚内养（shed 的三单形式）

sentences.sentence: The snake sheds its skin once a year.
It spills its food and sheds all over the place.
sentences.translation: 它把食物打翻，洒得到处都是。

sentences.sentence: A nice video published online last month sheds light on expertise and the conscious mind.
sentences.translation: 上个月网上发布的一段不错的视频阐释了专业知识和意识。
